0: Bathroom is very very dated needs updating
Steam room and jacuzi rarely works no proper locks on mens showers since last refit
there was major refurbishment going on but there was no mention of this when i booked
The hotel is undergoing a refurbishment which is much needed as it does not look as if it has been touched since the 1990s
In middle of being refurbished but did not mention when booking

Person on reception when we were leaving was not very interested in the fact that our stay was not satisfactory and told us that the renovation works were mentioned on their website but that you would have had to be looking for it
The staff around the hotel could do with been a bit more friendly informing guests there is a refurb underway would probably be a good idea too
The hotel is undergoing a refurb so I will only add that its not before time as some of the décor was a little tired but all in all its great
After mentioning about the steak issue my partners food was left on the table and not refreshed
1: I have not stayed for a while and was impressed at the refurbished and fresh look of the hotel when I arrived this timethey have done a lot to upgrade the look of the hotel but something else has been lost too

The rooms have been recently refurbished to an outstanding quality which we were very impressed with the only down note is the water temperature in bathrooms but that has already been mentioned for health and safety
The refurbishment is good however the noise from the road is quiet extensive as are the idiots that insist on slamming their bedroom doors all night
Since then the hotel has been refurbished and it now looks like a true Crowne Plaza rather than the rebadged Holiday Inn it was
Breakfast was deliciousSpa was niceStaf were friendly Just needs some updating and tlc
Check out just as easy no surprise costs and we felt very relaxed and refreshed from our stay
The rooms and communal areas have been refurbished and every thing is in pristine condition
2: did not disappoint bar restaurant area looks really good rooms totally revamped now able to offer club rooms with a beautiful club lounge
Finally been refurbished and brought up to standard of the other Crowne Plazas around the country
The gym equipment could do with an upgrade and the hotel is probably due some redecoration but room was clean bed good staff pleasant and breakfast excellent
Clean spacious rooms Shower could be modernised
good breakfasts especially the fresh cooked onesvery pleasant staff we told maintenance man shower head did not work he fitted new one
Booked an Executive Club room with access to the Club Lounge at this recently refurbished hotel as I needed to complete a milestone on the IHG Rewards Club programme
Will be back for sure thanks for a great break left feeling refreshed and very happy
